name: web-to-mcp
description: Web to MCP - A unified platform for capturing website components and sending them to AI coding assistants

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:extension"
scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run python manage.py runserver
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:extension
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install && cd ../extension && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:extension
scripts.test:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run python manage.py test

author: Web to MCP Team
